resources.string: Welcome to VotAR. Press the camera button to begin, or on this text to open a help page in your browser.
This is an alpha (unfinished) version for testing purposes only. Use the camera button to begin.
Do you want to quit VotAR ?
Failed to create the photo directory
Something has gone wrong with the photo processing (NativeAnalyze failed to return the bitmap data)
The photo app exited without sending back any photo to VotAR
The photo app exited without sending back any photo to VotAR (2)
The internal webserver could not be started, remote display wont be available
Unable to find the photo application to launch
The photo application repported an error
Unable to get the file path of the selected photo (data==null)
Unable to get the file path of the selected photo
Unable to use the android storage space. If you have configured your device to use an external SD card for application storage, check that it is working correctly.
VotAR does not have permission to open the photo file. If you opened a photo on an other application directory from the image gallery, try to copy it in your image gallery.
VotAR does not have permission to use the device camera.
